translations: 使……有理智；将……作理性研究

sentences.sentence: I tended to mistrust my emotions and intellectualize everything.
sentences.translation: 我倾向于怀疑自己的情感并把一切理性化。

sentences.sentence: But don't over-intellectualize your emotional reaction. Instead, get out of your head and trust your instincts.
sentences.translation: 不要不要对自己的情感过于理智，相信你的直觉。
